ipxact:component.ipxact:name: SampleComponent
ipxact:component.ipxact:description: Example component used in the IP-XACT standard.

ipxact:mode.ipxact:name: Boot
ipxact:mode.ipxact:description: Defines the remap state associated with the component at boot time.

ipxact:mode.ipxact:name: Normal
ipxact:mode.ipxact:description: Defines the remap state associated with the component after boot time.

ipxact:mode.ipxact:name: AlternateRegisterGroup
ipxact:mode.ipxact:description: Defines the state associated with alternate registers in this component.

ipxact:view.ipxact:name: RTLview
ipxact:view.ipxact:description: Simple RTL view of a component.

ipxact:view.ipxact:name: TLMview
ipxact:view.ipxact:description: Simple TLM view of a component.

ipxact:clearboxElement.ipxact:name: ImportantInternalSignal
ipxact:clearboxElement.ipxact:description: Defines access point for forcing sim values

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: comp_dual_mode
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Indicates dual mode support is desired.

ipxact:assertion.ipxact:name: ArbitraryAssertion1
ipxact:assertion.ipxact:description: Arbitrary assertion to show syntax. Must evaluate to true.
